website_summaries.verdict: One of the most simple play tables on the market. Extremely easy to maintain and clean up after intense play.
pros: Durable plastic construction will survive the abuse of young kids in dramatic play
Bright colors are fun for younger toddlers
cons: Lacks extensive organization features to keep the area clean

customer_reviews.title: WARNING, California Proposition 65, contains chemical causing cancer!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set but I had to get rid of it. I was wondering is this was BPA free etc and when I went to look into the additional information section, I found this " For California residents. WARNING: This product contains chemicals known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects ..." I am shocked, how can they sell something that is so unhealthy for kids??? Please, do not purchase this set!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my daughter & as you can see it also holds the weight for an adult man! I absolutely love this table & I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mix 'em up!
customer_reviews.text: I love bright, colorful, fun things and I own a child care business, so this table and chairs set was a must for our play area. They are brighter in person and I love them! I love mismatched things as well, so I couldn't help but mix up the legs and seat backs!! The kids love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set that stands the test of toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little set! After a wooden Crayola table and chairs took my an hour to set up and 10 minutes for my rowdy 2 year old to break, I went with plastic. This set took a grand total of 3 minutes to put together and hasn't come apart once! Definitely recommend for toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Caeley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad. Not too sturdy, but for the price, it's within value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table. It was easy to assemble. The sturdiness could definitely be better. It’s made of light weight plastic so the sturdiness isn’t the best but it isn’t the worst either. It just could be improved for sure. I was asked to rate the “easy to fold” it doesn’t fold. So Idky I was asked to rate that. The colors are vibrant. It’s cute but it won’t last forever for sure. My 2.5 year old twins use it to eat at & do other table activities here. It serves its purpose. The price could’ve been cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: VERY flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors! The kids (5 years and 1.5 years) love it. However, it slides around SO EASY. The kids have issues sitting in the chairs because they scoot too easy. When my 1.5 year old tries to get out of the chair, it slides out from under her. Three times now she has landed on her face trying to get up. My 5 year old has the opposite issue with sitting down. The chair will slide at the slightest touch and he has to pull it back to be able to sit. I have considered returning it, or buying the Little Tikes brand instead. Definitely not worth the $48 they ask.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis D.

customer_reviews.title: YOUNG toddler-sized table & chairs
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture, no-tool assembly-literally just snap legs into bottom of chair & back support onto top of chair. Only complaints are I don't think it's worth the price for how lightweight/flimsy it is & this is definitely for smaller children; my very soon-to-be 2 & 3yr olds are a little big for it
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for young children!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 young grandchildren, ages 5 and 3 1/2, to use outdoors. My granddaughter is autistic and trying to do craft type projects can turn into a messy situation. Being able to have an area outside to play with play doh, etc., this table set is the perfect solution. My daughter says that it is super easy to clean. She just sprays it with the hose. It also gives them a nice, sturdy place to have snacks or picnic lunch without having to climb over a bench like a picnic table. The kids also loved the bright colors. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Okerstrom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is 16months and we have had this for a few weeks now. The chairs are just a tad bit high for him but he will grow into them. He pushes them around, drags them and entertains himself rearranging the chairs.:-) The chairs seem sturdy and the colors are true to the picture.These are economical and will stand the abuse of my young toddler! Great buY!
customer_reviews.author: Ace Man III

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and unstable
customer_reviews.text: I start with the positive. Yes, it is easy to assemble and clean. However, it is NOT stable at all (my little one fell so many times), very cheap made and not comfortable at all. The plastic is very thin and unsteady
customer_reviews.author: Limlim128

customer_reviews.title: Great table, not as sturdy as I expected
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loved getting this as a gift and loves sitting at it. It’s colors are bright and super easy to clean. The only issue I have is the sturdiness of the table. The pieces just snap together for easy assembly but the chairs are just plastic so they aren’t structurally sturdy if you’re toddler is going to be on and off them and playing around. Just a little wobbly. I would be fine with the wobblyness if we didn’t pay as much as we did for it. I think the product should be cheaper but it’s still a good table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors! sturdy enough to support myself in a chair (170&36wks prego) table sturdy enough for 3yo to stand on. Pictured with my 1yo son for size comparison and pictures with book shelf and 12 bin toy organizer from same brand for another size comparison. Only thing I disliked was the little black felt type stickers that belong on bottom of chair and table legs. Don't let your kids see you put them on or they will take them back off haha assembly was extremely easy. Overall. Kids love it and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Paegan

customer_reviews.title: This is not at all what it looks like and is described
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all what it looks like and is described. It's very flimsy and cheap, will never buy this product or recommend to a friend or family member. Don't waste your time buy a wooden table or something that's better quality. Will fall apart or break very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: My 3yr olds love this table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great value for the money. I wanted a small table for my kids to use with their play kitchen and as an indoor craft table and this definitely fits the bill. Both myself and my 270lb husband have sat on the chairs and they held our weight just fine. We have this set on a carpeted floor and we haven't had any issues with tipping or sliding chairs, but I'd imagine they would be less stable on a smooth hard floor. All in all this set was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: CEZ

customer_reviews.title: Quality not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect the table and chairs to be so flimsy. The table warps when it's moved at all, making it unlevel. My two year old likes to sit in the chairs, but she falls a lot when sitting down and standing up, because, again, it's flimsy. It was easy to assemble, but it wasn't worth the cost, personally. I'm already searching for a better table and chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T

customer_reviews.title: Good table, bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Needed something simple and sturdy for my kiddos now that they are outgrowing their highchairs and because I babysit my friends kids. This was literally a snap to put together. My kids instantly sat down and started playing with it. Only con is there's nothing keeping everything from sliding around on my tile floor so I may have to find something to help with that. I'd definitely recommend and can't wait for my second set to get here. (Yes I ordered another one lol)
customer_reviews.author: Tisha Woods

customer_reviews.title: Colorful but not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive table and chair set my toddler uses for eating and crafts. It is quite light and at a year and a half he was able to pick up the table and chairs and throw them all over the place whenever he felt like it. Wish it were just a bit more heavy duty/ stable, but then again it can be moved to a different location easily. Set up was quite easy. It is cute that he sometimes walks around naming the color of the chairs... and there’s room for others” little people” to share the table space with him. If you’re in a budget or just need something quick, this is your table set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I brought this set for my 2-yr old toddler. The colors are vibrant and beautiful. However, the table and chairs are complete garbage. It's not sturdy at all. Very flimsy. It's def worth buying this set from Ikea. Although Ikea's is more money. Def worth it the Ikea toddler/kid set way more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: While the set was easy to assemble, the table and chairs are all poorly designed. The plastic is too light - table is flimsy and chairs are not sturdy. My 14 month old tried to sit on it and the chair fell to the side because the legs are not wide enough to be stable....or is it the plastic? I have returned.
customer_reviews.author: NewMom0215

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: This table and chairs set are great! They are plastic but string plastic I even sat on it and it held me up pretty good. My daughter loves the bright colors and my chairs don’t move around much. It’s easy to clean even after eating or play dough time! I love the fact you can use different colors pieces to make it mismatch and make it fun. This will be the table my daughter will use for a while . I recommend it to Anyone with kiddos
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good for toddlers. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for daycare. Not heavy or very sturdy. Used with 15mo-4yo. The younger ones have a hard time getting up on their chairs and since the chairs are quite light, they tend to fall over. However, since they are light, falling out of them, into them, stubbing toes on them, etc. is not a painful issue. 😉 Very easy to clean. I like the colors, bright and vibrant. Took less than 5 mins to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Family33

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ON CARPET, TERRIBLE ON HARD FLOORS
customer_reviews.text: Works great on carpet, but I'd recommend skipping this table set if you have hardwood floors. I bought this set for my 2 boys, ages 2-4, to eat their meals & for coloring. Like some reviewers have mentioned, it's really light and moves around a lot causing falls. The chairs are small enough that the falls are harmless, it just gets a little annoying. Overall, I like the table. It's cute, functional and the perfect size for my boys.
customer_reviews.author: nbacc

customer_reviews.title: light and and safe
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a table and chair set light enough for my toddlers' safety in case they fall and bump on the edges and this is PERFECT! It stands on the play area where I have foam mats so I don't have a problem with it sliding around, if anything, it hardly moves. It's perfect for a coloring, snack time, or just a platform for kids to play with their toys. Also, assembly took 3 minutes without reading instructions, it's really very easy and easy to store away. I thought this was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Saira

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, very happy..
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fast. And when I put it together it took all but 10mins if even. I used Another reviewers suggestion...... with the rubber grip bottoms. Great idea btw. Ordered them too, they arrived before the table lol. Anyways I love the table. Checks all the boxes, and surprisingly cuz it was a good price. Happy with my purchase. I purchased the table f for my 3 year old daughter. Eventually I’m sure we will swap colors, mix and match all the seats and legs lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: The light weight material to me was perfect and the option to change around the color of ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was a bit skeptical about making this purchase but decided to give it a try. The light weight material to me was perfect and the option to change around the color of the chairs are just outright fun! I cannot give it 5 stars because although for snack time it is great for four children, but when it was time to do assignments and art projects the table only have enough space for one child to work. Other than that I think its great and will most likely purchase a few more sets to accommodate the other children.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Tipsy but good.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because it isn't sturdy and the plastic legs aren't all exactly the same, even of the same color so they don't seem to pop in properly. You can't tell unless you look at that up close. It is a great lightweight kids table. My 2 year old uses it every day to color on and eat off of. I have it on carpet because the chairs can tip over easily. He's rough and tough and gets back up when he falls down so it isn't an issue for us. It wipes clean easily. Can be moved around because it is so lightweight. The bright colors are nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 mth old to use. She loves it. We even use it as our craft table. It is easy to clean and pretty sturdy. I've seen an 8 year old sit on the chair without it breaking or falling. The colors are nice and vibrant. It's easy to assemble. Snap the legs on and the back of the chair and you are done!
customer_reviews.author: SHERALI

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy....
customer_reviews.text: Although the colors are bright and cute these chairs and table are so flimsy my toddler couldn’t get in and it without tipping over and any pressure on the table would make it wobble and uneven. It’s now in the trash pile :/
customer_reviews.author: Chasatie Hall

customer_reviews.title: My two year olds broke a chair on day two
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited about this purchase as the reviews were great. I've learned my lesson about not checking measurements for one. I wanted an activity table for my twins and this would work for one child not two. Also my kids are a little rough but I have no idea how they cracked a chair so quickly. It seems sturdy but not so much. Cute little set though.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but slippery he’s fallen off a few times
customer_reviews.text: 1 1/2 yr old. He eats, draws, colors, plays sitting at this table. It’s cute and easy to clean. I have it on our living room wooden floor which might be why it slips a little, my son has fallen off the seat a few times trying to sit. I also don’t like the hole in the back of the chair base because he’s learning how to sit and his foot easily goes right into that hole a lot. I find myself holding the chair steady for him to sit in it right.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The table is cute and super easy to put together but not durable at ALL! I have 3 kids 5 and under and within a month maybe 2 of the chairs were broken. The chairs are made from very cheap feeling plastic. The table has held up well and feels sturdier than the chairs. Overall not a terrible buy for the price,just not very durable for children
customer_reviews.author: Amanda calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great set, I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! So easy to set it up, it is light but at the same time strong, I can sit on the chair and it will hold me :) this is a great buy for toddlers, my little one enjoys moving the chairs around, adding toys on the table.. she loves it! I also love the fact that it will take very little space to store.
customer_reviews.author: Tila K

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money if you don’t mind altering
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy, but an easy fix. I filled the legs of the table and chairs with dry pinto beans and covered with glue gun sticks. I also placed non slip pads on the legs. Perfect! Added weight to stop the kids from tipping over and stops them from scooting on the floor. My grandson tipped over the first day. This product is very light.
customer_reviews.author: NursePepper

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: The table is extremely flimsy as are the chair legs. Anytime I see my little one try to get in the chair (18 mo) I go over to him to make sure he doesn't tumble because he has before! The legs on the table are so flimsy that it is not level. My son loves the colors so that's a plus, but for the money I wish I got something more stable. Could be better for an older toddler?
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Souza

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a tad flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little table as far as table use goes. It's a little flimsy as far as regular toddler abuse goes. The backs keep popping out of the chairs on one side or the other when they get picked up. Also the table is on carpet because it's so light it just slips around on the wood floors. But if it's not set perfectly on all fours then it wobbles, so every time little one pushes against it, it becomes a wobbling surface. All of that being said it's still pretty awesome and still the go to place for coloring or eating.
customer_reviews.author: JamieD

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic but gets the job done. ...sorta
customer_reviews.text: Needed a toddler table and chairs in a pinch when I was having a lot of moms with their kids over my house. It got the job done, in that I had extra seating for some kids to eat their lunch at, but the table is actually too small for 4 kids to fit with plates to eat at. They would need tiny dessert plates to all fit. Also, it's very cheap plastic and scratches very easily and doesn't seem very durable. It works for the time being though, and have gotten some use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Quenten Lehrschall

customer_reviews.title: CANCER WARNING!!!️!!️!!️!!️!!️!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY!!!!! IT HAS A CANCER WARNING!!!!!!!!! I had already discarded the box so I had to toss it in the garbage! DO NOT GET THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Not for little toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This table is better for children older than 2-2 1/2. I have 18 month old grandsons and they fall often getting into the chairs. The table is flexible . They are sturdy in the sense that the chairs hold weight if sat on like adults sit down but when a child puts a knee down first, the chairs often fall over. I will put this away until they are older
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Ok, kind of flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The quality isn't the greatest. A little over priced for how flimsy they are. They are fine for small children. But I wouldn't let older kids on them. Don't tip, or they may collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Doglover

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy to set up, good value, not the most sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This set of table and chairs is so cute! My son is two and loves coloring with his crayons. He is learning to stay on the page but if any crayon gets on the table it easily washes off. Parts of the chairs, like the backrest, the plastic is more bumpy and crayon doesn’t seem to come off. My son loves his table and chairs and sits there every day. The table is not as sturdy as it could be. Other than that it’s pretty good value. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs assemble really easily. It’s o carpet, so sometimes, it leans a little. I have to straighten the legs before I place any food on the table. Other than that, it works. My kid disassembled the chair just for kicks the other day. She’s 4.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Weak combination
customer_reviews.text: My child is three years old and he still likes to play with toys on the ground. Such frequent stooping can easily affect the child's physical development, so I plan to buy a set of tables and chairs for him. Let him sit in a chair and read a book and play with his toys on the table.The table and chairs are easy to install and the bright colors will catch the children's attention. However, some parts are not stable together, and the feet will fall off when the chair is picked up. The situation is unsettling
customer_reviews.author: AIMEI

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. Its sturdy enough for 1 to 5 year olds and it is so easy to put it together. What I love about it is that there are no screws involved and as a dad, it makes putting it together so easy. Only took me about 5 minutes. Well worth the money because it added value to my life as a father since they can sit down and eat there food on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's cute but plastic
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set and easy to put together. But other reviewers were right. The kids take them and throw them around easy since they are so light. But they do hold up and adult. I had a meal with my daughter and I weigh 160.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This is great and easy to put together. We bought it to use as their kitchen table for meals, twin 3 year olds and an 18 month old. It’s too small for that purpose so will be sending it back, but maybe for tiny kids and projects this would be a good fit. If it was slightly larger would have been perfect. Also, SUPER easy to move around so our youngest continually pushes it from one side of the kitchen to the other. Just as an FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Too light weight for little kids
customer_reviews.text: It is the first time to leave a review because of this item. I got this package and assembled successfully so, just thought my kid could enjoy with them. But, my girl cannot enjoy with this. Because this is too light weight to hold a kid. My girl held a chair to sit on it but, she could not hold it and fell down with the chair. Not only first trying. Whenever she tried to hold for sitting, she fell down. So, I should help to sit down on the chair always. I know this is for kids so, it should not be heavy to use for kids. But, it should be enough heave for not getting any accident.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough. Very light weighted so its hard to keep it in place w little ones.
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller than expected but it will work for us for now. Also, its plastic so its not sturdy enough. Keeps slipping everywhere. Chairs are not stackable. Its better for older kids since it works for my 5 year old. I have an almost 2 year old who is not able to sit in it because chairs need to be held so she doesn't slip and fall when attempting to sit down in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table and chairs, but very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together, took two minutes. And look great. The only issue i have is the table and chairs are extremely light weight. So when the children go to sit, the chairs slip from under them. This can also be because the table and chairs are on a wooden floor and slide. But a little more weight and I think they would stay put better. I’m going to add rubber to the bottoms and see if that helps. Great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy, easy to tip chairs when sitting down
customer_reviews.text: very small children will fall in these chairs, table and chair are very lightweight, as the girls go older they work fine and the lightness comes in handy, they love moving them around. but in children under 2 caution, they tip easily
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong material
customer_reviews.text: I love the set but I wish it was Stronger one of the backs cracked on the chair and I haven't even had it for a while. I'm disappointed because I feel it won't last long I had that I was hoping to get a year use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: mariana

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and super cute! I got this for both my 2 and 6 year old, but my six year old who is small for his age probably won’t fit his legs under the table in a few months. It’s perfect for my 2 1/2 year old old though. I love it and the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy2Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, very light weight.
customer_reviews.text: The table and chair is the perfect height for toddlers and small kids it fit perfect to my 2.5 year old, he sits comfortably, his knees fit inside the table. It was easy to put together. The chair seam sturdy the table as well. The only down side is that the table is very very light weight and moves very very easily. I may put some weight inside the table leg and add a nonslip pad to the bottom of the legs to help stop moving. If you use the table on a mad it does not move as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia A

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set and my daughter loves it! You can mix and match the legs and backs on the chairs to make a rainbow of options! It's easy to clean and lightweight (my one-year-old enjoys rearranging the furniture right now, so being lightweight is really convenient). I just wish it was a small bit shorter, just so the smaller kids can use it as well as the bigger toddlers. My daughter is already 30 1/2 inches, but she is still a little to short to sit on the chairs herself, so she quickly gets frustrated and calls to me for help, or tries and the chair goes out from under her. Otherwise, very colorful, fun and useful set!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The table and chair set will serve the purpose for now. It will not be something my grandson will be able to use more than a year because he is almost at the weight restriction now. This was my mistake for not checking on everything before I purchased it. It is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B. Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together as i watched my brother assemble it. My grandbaby love love live to sit in all her chairs, play and eat at her table. Its too cute to watch her enjoy herself. I love it, the colors are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little set, worked for 18 months to 10 yrs old
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about this set. I took the advice of previous reviews and bought a kids rug to keep this from sliding and it was perfect. 18 month olds could carry the chairs around easy. 10 year old even sat at the little table. The uncles (185, 230, and 250 lbs) even sat in the chairs for awhile with no problems, although they were careful not to shift. Not recommending for adults, just mentioning they seem oddly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old for Christmas. Assembly was easy enough where she helped put it together. I just had to give a little strength to make sure it snapped in place. Nice an sturdy as well. Nice size area to do plenty of things on.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was looking for a table set that had more than two chairs and I found this one and I bought this set for my great-grandson's 2nd birthday and he and two of his little friends just love it. My daughter sent me a picture of the three of them sitting at the table having breakfast with their tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble play table for my toddler. Very light like others mentioned but I think that is a good thing. After helping me put it together, he spent 5 minutes moving the chairs around the table. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: John Coltrane

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for her learning to eat on. I like the set itself, cute for a toddler, but it is VERY flimsy and not sturdy at all! The table and chairs will easily flip over at the least amount pressure from of the child. I took the time to put cute vinyl on it, then upon delivering it to my grand daughter, realized it was flimsy for her to sit on/learn to eat on. Sorry I bought it! A waste of 60.00.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Paramoure

customer_reviews.title: Great for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 4 yr old daughter! I broke her other table and was looking for a decent price table with chairs. This is it! Easy to put together, sturdy for her. She likes to mix the colors of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Colorful table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: My twelve-year-old son assemble the pieces so easy very sturdy for a thick toddler nice and colorful and very good for children to sit play and eat. A bit High calls but overall very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Love and care
customer_reviews.text: Everything's easy! They even packed it so organized it felt like someone was holding my hand showing me the way. You pull out the seat of a chair out and it'll have the legs just hanging out in it. You just pop them in. I felt like someone was there showing me what to do, pft directions..... don't need them.
customer_reviews.author: madeline

customer_reviews.title: Good Table But a Bit Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: First off, my 18 month old daughter loves having her very own table! I'm fairly pleased with this table...but I admit that I expected more. The table and chairs are a bit flimsy, and the chairs do tip rather easily. Granted, my daughter isn't exactly gentle. To the table/chairs credit, they haven't broken yet with my daughter's craziness. Three stars because for $50 bucks I would expect more than some flimsy plastic. Strong and durable, but flimsy at the same time. If you push the table on carpet, it will buckle a bit and stay uneven. I'm not sad that I bought it, but I'm not as satisfied as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: zw

customer_reviews.title: Not the size expected. No 5-8 year old will comfortably enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Product details stated that the age ranges are from toddler to 8. I have a 2 year old who is in the lower bracket of weight and height and this table is almost too small for him. Kinda of a waste
customer_reviews.author: courtnee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs! It’s super light and easy for my little girl even to move around. If you’re looking for something heavy weight and sturdy this isn’t your set. But it’s perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the set as a gift for my grandson who will be turning two. My daughter informed me that if he leans in the chairs that the legs want to collapse. She was warning me not to purchase another set for my granddaughter. She said the table does okay but the set is cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Schultze

customer_reviews.title: Table set works great for my family!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 and 2 year old, they love this table! It’s easy to clean, assemble, and put away. In recent reviews it talk about the table being light weight. That actually works better for us because the boys use the chairs for tv time, to sit on the patio and other things so it’s easy for them to carry. It also talks about the table and chairs sliding on bare floor. The company sent black stopper to put at the bottom of the set and they work fine. I like this table set and I’m happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dixon

customer_reviews.title: My toddler love this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old! She loves it! Even my 200 pound husband can sit in a chair. The chairs are very light where she can carry them all around the house. I did read you can put sand in the legs to weigh them down a bit. Its great for her to color on, play with play doh and toys. I would buy it again or recommend
customer_reviews.author: V.Flo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but cautious chair footing.
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids now have an eating table of their own. They enjoy it. I swaped out the chairs for a more sturdy ones. They kept sliding across the tile floor. They already had their favorite cartoon characters chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Gera

customer_reviews.title: Easy Easy Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great table for kids. My babies use it only problem in a way is it’s so light they pick it up and flip it and probably spend more time sitting on it upside down then eating at it but great for them.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Set is pretty cool for the price, my 1.5 year old really enjoys being able to carry around this setnsince it's so light weight. But with it being so light weight, the seats shift every time she goes to sit down causing her to fall almost every time she tries. Hopefully she'll get the hang out it soon. Other than that, cute set, great price!
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: It's not sturdy....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table and chair set for my home day care , it looks so colorful but the chairs are not sturdy. The table is quite ok and It mentions it's for children age 3 to 8 years. It's not even fitting for my 5years old boy and I won't recommend this product those who have big kids.
customer_reviews.author: Senthil Letchumana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy, cleans easily, it takes a lot to create any wear and tear. I've had this taboo for my kids several months. Indoor, outdoor, eating, crafts, tantrums and it's still just as great as when I first purchased
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Kids will definitely like it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and clean. My daughter actually put it together and loves it! It isn't super sturdy, but seems like a cheaper plastic. For the price it works and does the job. I'm happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: GB93

customer_reviews.title: MY KID LOVED IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - well made, good price, but most of all my grandaughter loved it! Because she is only 15 mos old, she does not quite have the concept of what its for; rather she pushes around the chairs and table like they are toys, and loving every minute of it. As she grows older, I'm sure she use it for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Great price. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. I just got it yesterday and my son has gotten so much use out of it already! He loves his big boy table! It came fast. The box was very sturdy and tough to open, which was fine by me. And it took me all of 25 seconds to assemble. I love it already and have had it less than 24 hours!! Great product. Great price. Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Pantz

customer_reviews.title: Great and colorful table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love this and the colors are great. It’s so easy to clean and it’s just the right size for my granddaughters they use it all the time. Very easy to put together and nice and sturdy. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my twin grandsons. They love it. They eat their meals and play on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors !! Looks good in room!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Perfect size , not too big, vibrant colors of table and chairs and chairs are sturdy. I am reducing one star as table seems to loose its balance sometimes. Maybe because my daughter climbed and sat on it once, it could not take this load.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: lightweight plastic not for overactive little ones
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble. I like that it is lightweight but if your children are very active this product might not hold up to high activity. I am constantly reminding the kids to not balance their chairs on 2 legs as I'm afraid it will crack as well as putting to much weight on the table. I want this to last for awhile as they grow so if you are as watchful as i am this product should do fine. I do like it and the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: tokieboy

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money on better quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flimsy table and chair set. We ended up putting some sand in the legs to add a little weight bc my child would fall off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and kids really enjoying to do activities on it. Since chair does not have hand rest, it give flexibility to adult to share the table next to kid. From experience chair can take up to 200lbs. That’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: BhavikP

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old LOVES this! This is definitely the best thing we’ve ever purchased for him. He uses it everyday. The only reason I’m giving it 4/5 stars is because we’ve had it a month and it doesn’t sit flat like it used to. The chairs and table are a little more wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Hoped it would be more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This table and chairs seemed like it would be sturdy in the pictures, however, it looks like cheaper quality and is thinner plastic that makes it more flimsy in person.
customer_reviews.author: joni lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 2 year old. She fits them perfectly and very much prefers sitting at this table instead of in her high chair. These are very sturdy... she has stood on them before with no issues, although that isn't recommended. Also, I am 5'4'', currently 9 months pregnant and about 190 lbs and these chairs hold my weight fine. Getting up is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea & TR Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Great price for sturdy set
customer_reviews.text: Love this table and chair set. So easy to assemble (less than 7min). Light weight but sturdy. My daughter (2YO) loves it and she can move it around different locations in the house by herself. Great for arts and crafts and even for playing with her little friends.
customer_reviews.author: WTCB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table and chair set for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for toddlers to play and eat on at Grandma's house. Love the bright colors and it cleans up easily. Plus it stacks up out of the way nicely when the grandkids go home to Mommy and Daddy and Grandma collapses on the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect. My kids (2 & 4) helped me assemble it in less than 5 minutes. We love the colors! It's all easy to clean, easy to move around (lightweight), but sturdy enough for me to sit on a chair. The whole thing is perfect. Finally my kids have a place to sit for their writing and coloring, and we can move them all around the house with no problem. I only wish I bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table and chairs set in April of 2014 and my kids, now almost 4 and 6 are still using it daily. They eat at it and play/do arts and crafts. It's light enough so they can move it to different rooms and outside. Really easy to clean. My husband and I can sit on the chairs without breaking. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my nephew age 2. He really liked this, he does coloring, play doh and playing at the table. One of the chairs did break a few months later. I don’t know how so I can’t say if it was chairs fault or not. The chairs are pretty lightweight so they tip over pretty easily. I think this set would be good for age 2-4 maybe 5.
customer_reviews.author: kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our 3yo. Her 6yo sister even got a kick out of using it for make believe. It's as sturdy as one would expect of plastic. It's colorful and easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: M. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Little’s!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandkids when they come over. They picked their own color and are super happy to have their meals here. Took 2 seconds to put the legs on.
customer_reviews.author: SDCJane

customer_reviews.title: awesome table set
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with this purchase....the table set is super cute and super easy to put together....its definilty very sturdy im so glad i went with this....its priced great for what u get...im just super happy with it
customer_reviews.author: saphire janik

customer_reviews.title: Not a good Qualtiy
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised with the good rating for this product. It is so light weight and the age group is not at all the recommended one. My 4 year old son was not at all comfortable on it and it was not even staying stable. Please do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Palash Jain

customer_reviews.title: Chair arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received this in time for Christmas. Upon unboxing, the orange chair seat was damaged and cracked. So now we only have 3 chairs rather than four... kinda bummed since our kids cousins come over and now we’re one seat down with causes some chaos! But other than that, we do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine J.

customer_reviews.title: Do feel set is sturdy or safe for small kids.
customer_reviews.text: Thought product would be alot more sturdy for the price. Do not think product was worth the price. Chairs tip over easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table set for our grandkids to use when visiting. It is multi-purpose: they can eat at it, color and play games at it. It's a perfect size for them and there's no worries of them damaging it. Easy to assemble and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my littles. i have a 6 year old, 3 year old and a 1 year old and it will be good for all on them. my 6 year old may be a little bif but thats ok! easy to assemble and easy to wipe clean
customer_reviews.author: Rdailey18

product_meta.title: Humble Crew, Vibrant Kids Plastic Table and 4 Chairs Set
product_meta.description:
Color:Yellow Table/Vibrant Chairs

The Tot Tutors Kids Plastic Table and 4 Chairs Set will liven up any room or covered patio. It is the perfect size for toddlers to eat, read books, color, do arts and crafts, play board games, and just have fun. This piece of furniture is easy to assemble with snap-together components. The sturdy table and chairs are great for boys and girls ages 3 years and up. The molded construction on this plastic table and chair set is durable. 


The height of this furniture is just right for toddlers and preschool-aged children, and the bright and bold colors work well with kid-friendly decor. Giving your little one a table and chair set at their size gives them a sense of control and helps them learn independence. This kids table and chairs set comes in multiple bright and bold color options to complement the existing furniture in your home as well as the toy storage organizer products in Tot Tutors' line of kids furniture. Color options include Vibrant: yellow table with vibrant chairs (green, blue, orange, purple); Primary: blue table with primary chairs (red, green, blue, yellow) and Bright: white table with bright chairs (pink, green, aqua, magenta). 


Product sizing - 
Table: 20"W x 20"D x 17"H 
Chairs: 12"W x 11"D x 18"H 
Seat height: 10""H 


Tot Tutors offers a full line of children's furniture, organizational basics, and storage solutions. We have multiple room collections that fit the style of any home. Our children's table and chairs, toy storage organizers, toy boxes, bookcases, beds, and upholstered chairs blend with all of your home's furniture. Whether it's the living room, playroom, or your child's bedroom, Tot Tutors has just the right product to help your family grow.
feature_bullets: Includes 20" x 20" square table (17"H) and 4 chairs. Chairs: 12”W x 11”D x 18”H, Seat height: 10”H
Sturdy, lightweight plastic construction for easy configuration and rearranging
Perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 years and up

Comes in multiple color options-Vibrant yellow table with vibrant chairs (green, blue, orange, purple), Primary blue table with primary chairs (red, green, blue, yellow) & Bright white table with bright chairs (pink, green, aqua, magenta)
Easy snap-together assembly is durable and easy to clean
Ideal for your toddler's bedroom, playroom, the living room, or covered patio
Includes non-slip grip pad stickers for bottom of chair legs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,071 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited waranty on parts due to damage from shipping or manufacturing defects.
